Name: Mayan Whore
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, DO NOT STIR and serve with straws.
Review: An unfortunate name for implausible ménage à trois: coffee, tequila and pineapple, served long.
History: A cocktail from the 1980s when such names for cocktails were acceptable.
Nutrition: One serving of Mayan Whore contains 220 calories
